job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform, you willteam upwithotherISEengineerson customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search or open source AI tooling.We understand that most technologies are evolving very quickly, so broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success. By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience that helps customers grow their business and Microsoft to improve our products and services.

   Industry Solutions Engineering (ISE) is part of Microsoft Industry Solutions, a global organization of over 16,000 strategic sellers, industry experts, elite engineers, and world-class architects, consultants, and delivery experts who work together to bring Microsofts mission of empowerment and cutting-edge technology - to life for the worlds most influential customers.

   The ISE team works directly with customers looking to leverage the latest technologies to address their toughest challenges. We develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation to solve their challenges. This work involves the development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform. In this role, you will be working with engineers from your team and our customers teams to apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.

   Our team prides itself on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging everyone to share their unique viewpoints and be their authentic selves. Join us and help create life-changing innovations that impact billions around the world!

   Watch this video to learn more about who we are and what we do:https://aka.ms/csevideo

   Responsibilities

   Understand User Requirements
     * Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap

   Design
     * Participate in architecture design sessions and coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers to help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops. This is not a data scientist role - there is a data science team that will partner with you as the engineer on these engagements.

   Coding
     * Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code. We often bring Data & AI depth expertise to the existing ISE industry engineering crew that has end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
     * Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization to strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.
job_details.full_text:
AI Platform Engineer

As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform, you willteam upwithotherISEengineerson customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search or open source AI tooling.We understand that most technologies are evolving very quickly, so broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success. By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience that helps customers grow their business and Microsoft to improve our products and services.

   Industry Solutions Engineering (ISE) is part of Microsoft Industry Solutions, a global organization of over 16,000 strategic sellers, industry experts, elite engineers, and world-class architects, consultants, and delivery experts who work together to bring Microsofts mission of empowerment and cutting-edge technology - to life for the worlds most influential customers.

   The ISE team works directly with customers looking to leverage the latest technologies to address their toughest challenges. We develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation to solve their challenges. This work involves the development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform. In this role, you will be working with engineers from your team and our customers teams to apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.

   Our team prides itself on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging everyone to share their unique viewpoints and be their authentic selves. Join us and help create life-changing innovations that impact billions around the world!

   Watch this video to learn more about who we are and what we do:https://aka.ms/csevideo

   Responsibilities

   Understand User Requirements
     * Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap

   Design
     * Participate in architecture design sessions and coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers to help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops. This is not a data scientist role - there is a data science team that will partner with you as the engineer on these engagements.

   Coding
     * Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code. We often bring Data & AI depth expertise to the existing ISE industry engineering crew that has end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
     * Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization to strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on customer engagements, understanding requirements, and collaborating with data science teams rather than hands-on development of AI models or platforms. While it mentions AI technologies, the core responsibilities lean towards consulting and solution architecture rather than direct engineering of AI systems.

evidence.phrase: Understand User Requirements
evidence.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to comprehend customer needs and business context.

evidence.phrase: Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap
evidence.justification: This highlights the responsibility of translating customer feedback and business needs into actionable product improvements.

evidence.phrase: work with customers looking to leverage the latest technologies to address their toughest challenges
evidence.justification: This emphasizes understanding customer problems and aligning technology solutions with business goals.

evidence.phrase: help customers grow their business
evidence.justification: This points to a focus on business outcomes and customer success.

evidence.phrase: As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform
evidence.justification: The title itself indicates a software engineering role.

evidence.phrase: Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code.
evidence.justification: This explicitly states the requirement for software development skills and writing code.

evidence.phrase: coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers
evidence.justification: This indicates participation in the software development lifecycle, including coding.

evidence.phrase: building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.
evidence.justification: This implies developing software components or documentation that can be reused, a software engineering practice.

evidence.phrase: specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops.
evidence.justification: This directly mentions MLOps as a specific area of focus within AI solutions.

evidence.phrase: other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search
evidence.justification: Azure Cognitive Search is a service that often involves aspects of MLOps for managing search indexes and relevance.

evidence.phrase: Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI
evidence.justification: These are all cloud-based AI services offered by Microsoft.

evidence.phrase: Azure Cognitive Search
evidence.justification: This is a cloud-based search service from Microsoft.

evidence.phrase: Azure OpenAI
evidence.justification: Azure OpenAI provides access to large language models, often used with LLM frameworks.

evidence.phrase: Azure ML
evidence.justification: Azure Machine Learning is a platform for building and deploying ML models, which involves data modeling.

evidence.phrase: team up with other ISE engineers on customer engagements
evidence.justification: Highlights teamwork and collaboration with colleagues.

evidence.phrase: interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams
evidence.justification: Indicates collaboration with both external and internal teams.

evidence.phrase: working with engineers from your team and our customers teams
evidence.justification: Emphasizes collaboration across different groups.

evidence.phrase: Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization
evidence.justification: Directly states the need for collaboration.

evidence.phrase: partner with the product group
evidence.justification: Suggests working closely with product teams.

evidence.phrase: working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers
evidence.justification: Reinforces collaboration with engineering teams.

evidence.phrase: We understand that most technologies are evolving very quickly, so broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success.
evidence.justification: Directly addresses the need for rapid learning and adaptation in a fast-paced field.

evidence.phrase: embracing a growth mindset
evidence.justification: A growth mindset is closely related to continuous learning and adaptability.

evidence.phrase: address their toughest challenges
evidence.justification: Indicates a focus on solving difficult customer problems.

evidence.phrase: apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.
evidence.justification: Highlights the use of skills and creativity to solve problems.

evidence.phrase: build good AI solutions
evidence.justification: Implies the need to devise effective solutions to technical challenges.

evidence.phrase: develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation
evidence.justification: Suggests a proactive and innovative approach to solution development.

evidence.phrase: end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
evidence.justification: Indicates taking responsibility for the entire customer engagement lifecycle.

evidence.phrase: strategically invest in building reusable assets
evidence.justification: Suggests a proactive approach to creating valuable, reusable components.

evidence.phrase: help create life-changing innovations
evidence.justification: Points to a drive for creating impactful and novel solutions.
